Slams her into first and zooms toward the exit gate, guns the gas to prevent gate closing, rips metal gate off hinges with patrol car and uses bull bars to protect engine.
Ducks as rear windows implode from gunfire and maneuvers vehicle skillfully using other cars as cover to evade bullets.
Drives his patrol car at high speed, uses siren and horn urgently to reach home.
Confronts Levy aggressively, accusing him and goading him to turn the gun away from Rachel.
Holds the gun barrel firmly against his own chest to protect Rachel, telling her to run, enduring great pain and injury to save her.
Commands Rachel to get out of the room despite his own severe wounds, prioritizing her safety over himself.
